QuestData.Title: Ride to Orgrimmar
QuestData.Description: For just a few coins I will have a wind rider bring you to Orgrimmar. When you get there, you can take Grimtak's meats to Gryshka. Her inn is in the Valley of Strength.$B$BSpeak with me again when you are ready for the journey.
QuestData.LogDescription: Buy a wind rider to Orgrimmar from the wind rider master Burok, then bring Grimtak's Meats to Gryshka in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Something smells good! You don't have raw meat on you, do you?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, wonderful! Those are fine cuts! These are from Grimtak, are they? That orc sure knows his way into a lady's heart...$B$BOh, I can't wait to cook it. But not too much! Meat is best served rare, don't you think?
